name: Path of Supernova
description:
Goal : Bring the power to the constellation using the Supernova.
Supernova can connect to anything nearby and give it the power of motion.
To achieve the Path of the Supernova, you have to form a closed circuit, setting light to everything.

The Supernova can move along 3 directions.
Supernova will only push and pull connected sectors in that direction.

You can play through 16 levels or try random levels of 4 difficulty (Unknow is insanely difficult)

Controls : mouse clic to drag the Supernova
